caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. The video begins with an animation depicting a vast map with an under-construction toy castle on it. Then the scene shifts, showing a group of people on horseback entering a city. The townsfolk come out to welcome them. Afterward, one of the individuals walks into a room resembling a throne room. In front of the throne, a man resembling a guard engages in a conversation with him. The guard's attitude isn't particularly pleasant, but the man doesn't blame him. Following this, the man meets with several other men and a plump elderly gentleman. They show him great respect, suggesting that he is an important figure. They engage in a lengthy conversation while seated in chairs.
